product_name: Amphipod Hydraform In-Touch Handheld Bottle with Phone Pouch - 16 fl. oz.
long_description: The Amphipod Hydraform In-Touch Handheld Bottle with Phone Pouch offers all the benefits of the classic Hydraform Handheld with low-profile, clear, touch access to iPhone 4, 5 or similar-size phones. Leak-free, 16 fl. oz. water bottle isn't too big or too small; ergonomic shape helps eliminate hand tension and fatigue. Zippered phone pouch features a breathable, ultrasoft liner and easily adjusts to fit most hand sizes; clear panel allows full access to your phone's touch screen. Route your headphone cord through the integrated cord port or directly through the zipper. The Amphipod Hydraform In-Touch Handheld Bottle with Phone Pouch features a stretch-free and durable bottle harness.
short_description: The Amphipod Hydraform In-Touch Handheld Bottle with Phone Pouch offers all the benefits of the classic Hydraform Handheld with low-profile, clear, touch access to iPhone 4, 5 or similar-size phones.
